title: Tunche Free
description:
Tunche Download PC Game In Direct Link for free on SteamRIP
Tunche is a stylish hand- drawn action game with roguelike elements. You can go alone or with friends. Your task is to clear the Amazon forest from dangerous monsters . The game boasts detailed characters: the sorceress Rumi, the musician Pancho , the bird boy Karu, the warrior Naira and the Hat Kid from the highly acclaimed A Hat In Time.
At the same time, each hero has his own unique skills that need to be learned during the passage of the game. Choose one of the five unique characters: Rumi, the sorceress, Pancho the musician, Qaru the bird boy, Nayra the warrior & Hat Kid from the highly acclaimed A Hat In Time. To overcome the evil beasts of Amazonian forests you will have to learn the skills and ultimate abilities, that will take you further through the story with each playthrough.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
system_requirements.Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
